summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a trading authorization form requested by Rafael Otova from TD Ameritrade. Paul Barrett from Alpha Group Capital LLC is following up on the request and confirming the attachment of the necessary forms.

persons.name: Paul Barrett
persons.context: Paul Barrett is following up on a trading authorization form request and is associated with Alpha Group Capital LLC.

persons.context: Rafael Otova is the recipient of the email and is requesting forms from TD Ameritrade.
